channel.title: Paddling on Grad Student Problems
channel.description: Recent content in Paddling on Grad Student Problems

item.title: Biscayne
item.description: My canoeing partner had mentioned the Biscayne National Park to me. Upon googling I found out that the park was right next to the Everglades and had a lot of trips that looked interesting. I was surprised that I had not come across these adventures before. I booked my trips online (why can’t other parks allow this?). The snorkeling trip was not available here too because of the cold weather so instead I went a boat trip to a nearby island, which was pretty lame, and extremely unpleasant because of the cold.
